Body: I am reading about aorist and preterite verb forms. It seems that they are both forms which express perfective aspect and past tense. Is the difference between them simply in differing terminology or are there semantic differences as well?
Title: Is there a difference between a preterite and an aorist?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: “Reserve your abuse for your true friends.” — Larry Wall
